HeroSection.description: Join our community of learners and experts to exchange skills,discover new passion, and achieve your goals

SuccessStoriesSection.title: Success Stories
SuccessStoriesSection.description: See how Swapoo has transformed lives by enabling skill sharing and personal growth.

card1.title: Photography Enthusiast
card1.description: Sarah, a passionate photographer, taught her skills to aspiring artists and gained new perspectives .

card2.title: Coding Mentor
card2.description: Mark, an experienced software developer, mentored beginners and enhanced his teaching.

card3.title: Yoga Instructor
card3.description: Emily, a certified yoga instructor, expanded her reach and connected with students globally.

card4.title: Painting Passion
card4.description: Layla shared her love for watercolor painting, helping beginners express themselves creatively.

card5.title: Swimming Coach
card5.description: Kareem taught swimming techniques online and received nutritional coaching in exchange.

card6.title: Guitar Guru
card6.description: Omar offered beginner guitar lessons to fellow learners and got free singing tips from vocalists .

HowWorkSection.title: How Swapoo Works
HowWorkSection.description: Our platform connects individuals eager to share their expertise with those seeking to learn. It's a community-driven exchange where skills are valued and shared freely.

card1.title: Connect with Experts
card1.description: Find skilled individuals ready to share their knowledge in various fields.

card2.title: Explore Diverse Skills
card2.description: From coding to cooking, discover a wide range of skills to learn and master.

card3.title: Collaborate and Grow
card3.description: Engage in collaborative learning experiences that foster growth and development.

MatchesScreen.title: AI-Powered Skill Match
MatchesScreen.description: Based on your profile and preferences, we've identified potential skill trade matches that align with your interests and learning goals.
MatchesScreen.error: Something went wrong while fetching matches.

ScheduleSessionScreen.activeTradeCountError: You have reached the maximum number of free active trades. Please complete or cancel existing trades before starting new ones or upgrade to Pro for unlimited access.

CompleteProfileScreen.freePlanSkillLimitError: You can only select up to 2 skills to learn and 2 skills to teach on the Free plan. Please remove some skills or upgrade to Pro for unlimited access.

MessagesScreen.title: Messages
MessagesScreen.description: Communicate with potential matches, discuss details of the skill exchange, and schedule sessions.

SearchScreen.searchPlaceholder: Search by user name or skill...

PlansScreen.startFreeOrPro: Start free or go Pro for the ultimate Skill Trade experience.
PlansScreen.freeDescription: Perfect for getting started with skill trading
PlansScreen.selectUpTo2SkillsToLearn: Select up to 2 skills to learn
PlansScreen.selectUpTo2SkillsToTeach: Select up to 2 skills to teach
PlansScreen.oneActiveSkillTrade: 1 active skill trade at a time
PlansScreen.proDescription: Unlock unlimited potential with Pro features
PlansScreen.faqSwitchAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade to Pro or downgrade to Free at any time. When downgrading, you'll maintain access to Pro features until the end of your current billing period.
PlansScreen.faqCommissionAnswer: For Free plan users, a 20% commission is applied to any paid skill trades. For example, if you charge $50 for a session, $10 goes to platform fees. Pro users keep 100% of their earnings.
PlansScreen.faqLimitQuestion: What happends if I exceed my Free limits?
PlansScreen.faqLimitAnswer: You'll need to complete or cancel existing trades before starting new ones, and you won't be able to add more skills beyond your limit. Consider upgrading to Pro for unlimited access.
PlansScreen.alreadyPro: You are already on Pro plan
PlansScreen.upgradeError: Failed to upgrade to Pro. Please try again.
PlansScreen.alreadyFree: You are already on Free plan
PlansScreen.downgradeError: Failed to downgrade to Free plan. Please try again.

feedback.imagePermissionFeedbackDescription: Permission to access gallery is required!
